title: Superelastic hydrogel electrolyte incorporating helical protein molecules as zinc ion transport pathways to enhance the cycling stability of zinc metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02510E, Paper
Xiaoyun Xu, Songmei Li, Shubin Yang, Bin Li
A superelastic, high ionic conductivity and environment-friendly hydrogel electrolyte is developed based on the unique advantages of Î±-helical proteins.
